What is Parkour?

In a nutshell, parkour is a discipline of movement that focuses on self-improvement through creative use of the practitioner's surroundings.

There are a few main ideas that make parkour stand out from other physical disciplines and sports.

  • Autonomy - A traceur has no adversary or opponent to focus on. The only tools you need are the shirt on your back and a pair of shoes. The world is your playing field and your mind is your opponent. The discipline of parkour can be practiced in a completely individualistic manner, but it doesn't have to be.
  • Core Values - Traditional sports end at the sound of a buzzer, a certain score is reached, or when the opponent taps out. In parkour, the game never ends. With even occasional training and dedication, parkour's Five Core Values become part of your everyday life.

    Perseverance, Courage, Humility, Integrity, Respect

Our Group Classes

If you're not fond of doing something alone or you learn best when there are others around to cheer you on, then our group classes are perfect for you.

Our group classes will be in full force in a few months. In the meantime, feel free to Contact Us

Private Lessons

Maybe you feel you're not quite ready to join the group classes. Or maybe you're an advanced practitioner looking to go above and beyond the group classes.

Private lessons are for anybody. From the absolute beginner to the seasoned traceur, private lessons can become a valuable part of your training.

Take a look at our Private Lessons page for more details.
